name: ListHubspotForms
description:
Retrieve a list of HubSpot marketing forms.

Call this tool to obtain a list of marketing forms from HubSpot. It applies search filters if provided, otherwise returns the first 20 forms by default.

parameters.name: paging_cursor_token
parameters.description: The token indicating the cursor position for paginated results. Use `paging.next.after` from the previous response to fetch more results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: results_per_page
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of forms to retrieve per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: included_form_types
parameters.description: List of form types to include in results, e.g., 'hubspot', 'workflow', etc.

value_schema.description: The form types to be included in the results.

parameters.name: return_only_archived_forms
parameters.description: Set to true to return only archived forms in the results.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

value_schema.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the `paging.next.after` JSON property of a paged response containing more results.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

value_schema.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.

parameters.name: archived
parameters.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

value_schema.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.

parameters.name: formTypes
parameters.description: The form types to be included in the results.

value_schema.description: The form types to be included in the results.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
